title: integration_metrics
description:
Add integration qc metrics to an .h5mu file.

The metrics are generated using the scib library and stored in the uns column:
  - nmi_score: scib.metrics.nmi
  - ari_score: scib.metrics.ari
  - asw_batch: scib.metrics.silhouette_batch
  - asw_label: scib.metrics.silhouette
  - pcr_score: scib.metrics.pcr_comparison
  - graph_connectivity: scib.metrics.graph_connectivity
  - avg_bio: mean of nmi_score, ari_score and asw_label

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file

obsm_embeddings.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `X_scGPT`. The name of the adata
obsm_embeddings.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `X_scGPT`. The name of the adata.obsm array containing scGPT cell embeddings.

obs_batch_label.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `sample`. The name of the adata obs column containing the batch labels
obs_batch_label.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `sample`. The name of the adata obs column containing the batch labels.

obs_cell_label.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `cell_type`. The name of the adata obs column containing the cell type labels
obs_cell_label.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `cell_type`. The name of the adata obs column containing the cell type labels.

obs_cluster.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `cluster`. The name of the adata obs column containing the cluster labels
obs_cluster.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `cluster`. The name of the adata obs column containing the cluster labels.

uns_neighbors.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `neighbors`. The name of the adata uns object containing the neighbors information
uns_neighbors.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `neighbors`. The name of the adata uns object containing the neighbors information.

obsp_neighbor_connectivities.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `connectivities`. The name of the adata obsp object containing the neighbor connectivities
obsp_neighbor_connectivities.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `connectivities`. The name of the adata obsp object containing the neighbor connectivities.

output.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object
output_compression.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
